name: Jeffrey Wilt
text: Pizza isn't one of my first choices anymore. But I do like Marco's pizza. There is always some decent deals and the food is pretty much consistent. Why not 5 stars ya asking. I think a large pizza shouldn't look about the size of most medium pizzas at a local pizza shop.

name: Nicholas Weller
text: Love their pizzas. Specialty pies are delicious and love the crust toppers. We always get some tasty cheesy bread also. Toasted subs and salads are pretty darn good too. All in all, one of the best chain pizzerias anywhere.

name: Kim Ward
text: Great cheese! Great sauce! Okay bread! Awesome weekly deals!

name: Kelly Quinn
text: Fast pizza service. friendly staff and decent prices.

name: Thiru ogirala
text: It was xmas eve Im in middle of my trip and stopped at Marcos Pizza. I‚Äôm so satisfied with there customer service. Jeri explained everything i have ask for. And Pizzas are so delicious. Hope i ‚Äòll come to this place again.

text: Love the pizza especially the thin crust..also great salads and subs

name: Robert Shapiro
text: Best chain store pizza around.  Easy to order online, plus with the movie rentals right next door, getting pizza and a movie delivered at the same time is awesome.

name: Jessica Cole
text: I love this pizza! The crust is amazing.

Pizza sause is not desirable to my family. The crush is yucky too. Not sure what others like about it and boy the price. No thank you !!

text: Definitely our new favorite pizza. Everytime I call to order I get some one very friendly and polite, and just tonight the delivery woman noticed I had two dogs watching out the window and brought treats for them as well. Very good customer service and pleasant people!

name: Chris Boring
text: It's a small chain pizza joint. That said, I've ordered pizza there a few times now and have had no complaints so far. You can certainly get better quality pizza elsewhere, but you'll also pay more. Marco's pizza is exactly what it was ‚Ä¶More
